content: k2 k2tog p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round 70 sts round 45 *k2tog twice p2 k2tog k2 k2tog p2 repeat from * until end of round 50 sts round 46 *k2tog p2 k2tog twice p2 repeat from * until end of round 35 sts round 47 *k1 p2tog k2tog p2tog repeat from * until end of round 20 sts you may now skip to the finishing off section at the end of this pattern tttoooddddddllleeerrr sssiiizzzeee iiinnnssstttrrruuuccctttiiiooonnnsss cast on 80 sts and join to work in the round place a stitch marker here to mark the beginning of the round if you like you will have 80 sts in each round of this project until you reach the decrease section to form the twisted rib brim *kbl1 p1 and repeat from * for 6 rounds rounds 1 - 4 *k10 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round round 5 *k10 p2 fc3 p2 repeat from * until end of round rounds 6 - 13 *k10 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round round 14 *fc5 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round rounds 15 - 22 *k10 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round round 23 *k10 p2 fc3 p2 repeat from * until end of round rounds 24 - 31 *k10 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round round 32 *k10 p2 fc3 p2 repeat from * until end of round rounds 33 - 34 *k10 p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round tttiiimmmeee tttooo dddeeecccrrreeeaaassseee **note** you may want to switch to using dpns or the magic loop method from this point on round 48 *k2tog k6 k2tog p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round 72 sts round 49 *k2tog k4 k2tog p2 k6 p2 repeat from * until end of round 64 sts round 50 *k2tog k2 k2tog p2 repeat from * until end of round 48 sts round 51 *k2tog twice p2 repeat from * until end of round 32 sts round 52 *k2tog p2tog repeat from * until end of round 16 sts fffiiinnniiissshhhiiinnnggg oooffffff cut yarn and thread a yarn needle with the end run the yarn end through each of the stitches left and pull tightly closed like a drawstring tie off to secure and weave in all ends now you re all ready to top off your new favorite cable beanie with a lush pom pom and wear it everywhere cccooonnngggrrraaatttuuulllaaatttiiiooonnnsss yyyooouuu vvveee nnnooowww cccooommmpppllleeettteeeddd yyyooouuurrr vvveeerrryyy ooowwwnnn fffaaavvvooorrriiittteee cccaaabbbllleee bbbeeeaaannniiieee i hope you enjoyed this cable knitting pattern and photo tutorial be sure to sign up for our email newsletter so you don t miss the next one also i d love to see your work tag me in your photos on instagram using @thechesapeakeneedle #thechesapeakeneedle and #favoritecablebeanie so that i can find you easily i just might share your photos on my page if you
